summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4079 for the improvement of West Morgan Street, from 35th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49080, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
